price: 21. Et quand le Coran leur est lu ne se prosternent-ils pas ?[600]
arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩
footnotes: [600] Une prosternation est recommandée après la lecture de ce verset.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā quri-a ʿalayhimu al-qur'ānu lā yasjudūna
